Duties
sections.text:
of certain officers who impound livestock to notify Department; contents of

sections.heading: Cooperative
sections.text:
agreements for management, control, placement or disposition of livestock:

Required provisions; annual review by Department; cancellation.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: to take up or feed estray or feral livestock; enforcement; penalties.

sections.heading: Person
sections.text:
gathering estray or feral livestock to publish notice in newspaper;

requirements of notice.

sections.heading: Written
sections.text: notice to Department when person takes up estray.

sections.heading: Examination
Publication
sections.text:
of notice of estray required if owner cannot be determined; reimbursement of

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text:
of feral livestock gathered by Department; publication of notice of sale of

feral livestock; sale of injured or debilitated feral livestock.

sections.heading: Sale,
sections.text:
placement or other disposition of unclaimed estray; sale or placement of

unclaimed feral livestock; issuance of brand inspection clearance certificate

upon sale; marking, branding or identifying required before sale or placement.

sections.heading: Deposit
sections.text: of balance of proceeds of sale; records; payment to owner.

sections.heading: Person
sections.text:
taking up estray or feral livestock entitled to hold animal until relieved of

custody; unlawful use or taking of estray or feral livestock; penalties.

sections.heading: Escaped
sections.text: or removed estray or feral livestock may be recovered by person who took it up.

sections.heading: Estrays
sections.text:
and feral livestock may be taken up by agents of Department; procedure for

sections.heading: Liability
sections.text:
caused by trespassing livestock; liability of landowner for injury to

trespassing livestock; trespassing livestock treated as estrays.

sections.heading: Trespass
sections.text: on cultivated land: No award of damages unless land enclosed by legal fence.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.text:
of developer of residential, commercial or industrial structure adjoining

pasture for damages to legal fence.

sections.heading: Replacement
sections.text: of legal fence permitted; conditions; duty and liability.
